DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to learn if a paclitaxel-cisplatin combination regimen given in the neoadjuvant setting is active in locally advanced head and neck cancer. the safety of this treatment will also be studied.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Trial Neoadjuvant Paclitaxel and Cisplatin in Patients With Locally Advanced Head and Neck Cancer
DOC.criteria: Locally advanced, Stage IIIV (except M1), hand and neck cancer > = 1 measurable lesion not been previously treated for head and neck cancer history of another malignancy organ allografts preexiting neuropathy > = CTC grade 2
